title: Single-molecule detection of modified amino acid regulating transcriptional activity
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,31740-31744
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05488A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yuki Komoto, Takahito Ohshiro, Yuno Notsu, Masateru Taniguchi
Simple detection methods for acetyl lysine are essential for diagnosis and understanding of the physiological effects. We have detected and recognized acetyl lysine at the single-molecule level by combining MCBJ measurement and machine learning.
